ActDepartment of Employment and Social Development Act
PrecisAppointment of SELENA VERLYN BATEMAN of New Westminster, British Columbia, to be a full-time member of the Social Security Tribunal for the Income Security Section, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective September 27, 2021.
